title: Ladies of the Cove
description: Needing to relax after a week of class and murder, the Detective went to a sleepy little seaside town. Unfortunately, the kind of rest that people seem to get here is less "a good night's" and more "in peace". So it was back to the old murder board for the Detective.

personList.name: Ms. Archer
personList.description: A widow with a penchant for murder mysteries. Some people wonder if she's been acting out her books in real life.

personList.name: Ms. Poppy
personList.description: A fan of murder mystery stories. Hopefully she's not the type to make one of her own.

personList.name: Mrs. Curls
personList.description: A hair salon owner and wife of a clown. That's how she describes him at least. He's at least got great hair.

weaponList.name: Typewriter
weaponList.description: A charming if outdated piece of hardware.

weaponList.name: Shears
weaponList.description: Shiny. Hope they stay just the right distance from your neck.

weaponList.name: Murder Mystery Collection
weaponList.description: A lovely little book of murder mysteries. Hopefully all of which live entirely in the realm of imagination.
